attributes.additional_details: Has a cyclist myself , I see a lot of cyclists on the road without helmets, it against the law to ride a motorcycle without one , so I feel for the safety cyclists it should be the rule , they are more vulnerable than a motorcyclist
attributes.background: In 2019, 16,884 cyclists were injured in reported road accidents, including 4,433 who were killed or seriously injured. These figures only include cyclists killed or injured in road accidents that were reported to the police

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609365
